item.title: Overflowing Litter Bin, 26th December
item.description:
At the rear of Queensway Public Car Park, off Queensway, Petts Wood, Orpington: By the public footpath/railway bridge, there is a black public litter bin which is full and overflowing. The bin was not emptied before Christmas and is continuously full as it is needs emptying more frequently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queensway, Petts Wood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
